context: During the Cultural Revolution, grandpa was overthrown and told to attend a struggle session the next day. Then, someone hinted that he could pad his clothes to cushion the blows. So he padded his clothes with newspapers. The next day, during the beating, he discovered that the person holding the stick was the one who had given him the hint, and that person specifically struck the heavily padded areas.

context: In 1945, Chairman Kim Il Sung first proposed the vision of letting the people eat white rice and drink meat soup. Afterwards, his successor, General Kim Jong Il, inherited this wish and declared that he would ensure the people could eat rice and drink meat soup. And last year, General Kim Jong Un once again emphasized that he would make it so the people are eating rice and drinking meat soup within three years. A single bowl of rice and meat soup embodies more than 70 years of tireless care and concern from three generations of great leaders. When I think of this, my tears just can't stop falling
query: What is the meaning of this passage?
